messages.subject: FW: Reporter looking for more unschooling families
messages.msgSnippet: I m forwarding this for Jan Hunt (http://www.naturalchild.com/).  IMO a reporter who thinks a photo of an unschooler in college would be a powerful statement
messages.messageBody:
I'm forwarding this for Jan Hunt (http://www.naturalchild.com/). IMO a
reporter who thinks a photo of an unschooler in college would be a powerful
statement is powerfully missing the point <G>, but here's the info if
anyone's interested. ~Rue

-----Original Message-----
From: Jan Hunt [mailto:jan@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 13, 2006 12:53 AM
To: rue Kream
Subject: Reporter looking for more unschooling families


Hi Rue,

The Sun-Times reporter, Rosalind Rossi, is still looking for more
families to interview and just sent this request:

"Am still looking for an unschooled Chicago area student now in college,
or out of college, or a non-Chicago area student now in a Chicago area
college. Think a photo of an unschooled student now in college would be
very powerful statement."

Could you ask on your lists for anyone interested to write to Rosalind
at rrossi@... or call her at 312 321 2553.

Thanks!

Jan
